channel.title: meeting on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in meeting on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: 1-on-1 meetings
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Strong relationships are core to our culture, and 1-on-1 meetings are how we build them. Every manager has a 1-on-1 with each direct report, usually weekly or whenever works best for both.

item.title: Effective meetings
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To make working together flexible and productive, especially when we’re not all in the same place, we follow a few simple rules for meetings and group work.

item.title: How to conduct a meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Meetings are a staple in our work, helping us share info and tackle issues. But let’s be honest, they can easily become time-wasters if not run well.

item.title: Effective Meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To increase flexibility in how and where employees at Dwarves work, we agree on a shared set of constraints for group work and meetings.
